definition: a geological formation consisting of an underground enclosure with access from the surface of the ground or from the sea, to explore natural caves
details:
noun
- a geological formation consisting of an underground enclosure with access from the surface of the ground or from the sea
verb
- to explore natural caves
= synonyms: spelunk
- to hollow out as if making a cave or opening
= example: to hollow out as if making a cave or opening
= synonyms: undermine
